vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting an MF-2(A) Multifamily District and a resolution accepting deed restrictions volunteered by the applicant on property zoned CR Community Retail District, on the south line of West Wheatland Road, west of Clark Road
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval 
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval, subject to deed restrictions volunteered by the applicant
Z245-202(LC/MP) / Z-25-000034
